description: Type the reading for vocabulary words in the HSK 3 word list.

deck.question: 啊
deck.comment: ah; (particle showing elation, doubt, puzzled surprise, or approval)

deck.question: 爱好
deck.comment: hobby; fond of; to like; interest

deck.question: 把
deck.comment: (mw for things with handles); (pretransitive particle); to hold

deck.question: 包
deck.comment: to cover; to wrap; to hold; include; (mw for containers, packages, etc.)

deck.question: 北方
deck.comment: north; the northern part of the country

deck.question: 被
deck.comment: by (indicates passive voice sentences); a quilt/blanket

deck.question: 而且
deck.comment: moreover; in addition; as well as

deck.question: 差
deck.comment: differ from; fall short of; poor; inferior

deck.question: 成绩
deck.comment: achievement; success; results (of work or study)

deck.question: 除了
deck.comment: besides; except for; aside from; in addition to

deck.question: 带
deck.comment: band; belt; ribbon; carry; bring; take along; bring up (kids)

deck.question: 地方
deck.comment: place; space; room; part, (fāng: local; regional)

deck.question: 短
deck.comment: short (in length, duration, or height); lack

deck.question: 锻炼
deck.comment: to exercise; work out; toughen; to temper

deck.question: 发
deck.comment: send out; to issue; to show (one's feelings) | hair

deck.question: 放
deck.comment: put; to place; to release; to free

deck.question: 分
deck.comment: divide; part; minute; cent | component; share; ingredient

deck.question: 关
deck.comment: to close; shut; concern; relationship; turn off; mountain pass

deck.question: 过
deck.comment: to pass; to cross; go over; (indicates a past experience)

deck.question: 换
deck.comment: change; to exchange; to barter; to trade

deck.question: 讲
deck.comment: to talk; to lecture; to explain; a speech

deck.question: 角
deck.comment: horn; angle; unit of money (1/10 yuan); corner (Kangxi radical 148) | role (theater)

deck.question: 接
deck.comment: connect; to meet; to pick up (somebody); to receive

deck.question: 经过
deck.comment: to pass; go through; as a result of

deck.question: 刻
deck.comment: quarter (hour); (mw for short time intervals); carve; to cut

deck.question: 拿
deck.comment: carry in your hand; seize; to catch

deck.question: 难过
deck.comment: be grieved; be sad; have a hard time

deck.question: 骑
deck.comment: to ride (an animal or bike); to sit astride

deck.question: 起来
deck.comment: (beginning or continuing an action); to rise; get up (from bed)

deck.question: 上网
deck.comment: to surf the web; to go online

deck.question: 条
deck.comment: strip; (mw for long thin objects); item

deck.question: 为
deck.comment: for; because of; to; for the sake of

deck.question: 为了
deck.comment: in order to; for the sake of; for the purpose of

deck.question: 习惯
deck.comment: habit; be accustomed to; usual practice

deck.question: 洗澡
deck.comment: bathe; take a bath or shower; bath or shower

deck.question: 向
deck.comment: direction; towards; to turn; to face

deck.question: 校长
deck.comment: principal (of school, college or university); president; headmaster

deck.question: 需要
deck.comment: to need; to want; to demand

deck.question: 一边
deck.comment: one side; on the one hand; at the same time

deck.question: 一直
deck.comment: always; all along; straight (in a straight line)

deck.question: 遇到
deck.comment: to meet; run into; come across

deck.question: 元
deck.comment: Chinese monetary unit; dollar; first; principal

deck.question: 愿意
deck.comment: be willing; want to; be ready

deck.question: 站
deck.comment: stand; a station; be on one's feet; service center

deck.question: 张
deck.comment: (mw for flat objects); to spread out; (common surname)

deck.question: 照顾
deck.comment: take care of; look after; give consideration

deck.question: 只
deck.comment: but; only; merely; just | (mw for birds and certain animals)

deck.question: 才
deck.comment: ability; talent; just now; not until

deck.question: 终于
deck.comment: at last; in the end; finally

deck.question: 注意
deck.comment: pay attention to; take notice of; be careful
